Weâ€™ve all read enough â€œCovid sucks and hereâ€™s whyâ€ articles. So for both your and my sanity, Iâ€™m going to keep that discussion to a minimum. Instead, Iâ€™m going to focus on the Canadian Computer Science community and the broader new graduate student research community. Two events near and dear to my heart have either not been run since the start of COVID or have gone completely virtual and lost major attendance: CUSEC and CSGames.
